channel.title: If Anyone has DreamWeaver 8 PLEASE read
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm in the process of making a site, but for some reason my copy of dreamweaver 8 is corrupted. All I need is the right file called dwscriptsExtData.js heres a pic of the error
[IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/5407/erroryh6.jpg[/img]
if anyone has this file, PLEASE PLEASE post an upload link. I really need it, thanks

item.title: If Anyone has DreamWeaver 8 PLEASE read
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

It’s working successfully now.

Read full topic

item.title: If Anyone has DreamWeaver 8 PLEASE read
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

Just to let you know, all macromedia products (eg. Dreamweaver) can be downloaded directly off their site. It’s a “trial” but it includes the full version, so all you need is a serial. This way you don’t have to worry about corrupted files + fast download speed.

Read full topic

@leader wrote:

Buzzy:

leader i took your search and delete adivce and guess what! IT WORKED! thanks to everyone who helped! ill be sure to mention you on my upcoming site… its going to be HUGE its a work of all my skills, creativeness, and ideas from the first time i laid hands on a computer to the second that i upload the files.

I’m glad it worked well for you. Thanks again.

Your friend,
Leader

item.title: If Anyone has DreamWeaver 8 PLEASE read
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Uninstall. Download the Trial Version from www.adobe.com (Since adobe bought Macromedia, if you didn’t know). And since you got the trial version now, you will be absolutely sure that the files aren’t corrupted.

Then just enter in a serial name and number from www.serials.ws or some place.

Read full topic
item.source: If Anyone has DreamWeaver 8 PLEASE read

item.title: If Anyone has DreamWeaver 8 PLEASE read
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

That is definitely odd. Maybe the next time you try to reinstall Dreamweaver, make sure you delete all of the dreamweaver files on your computer. Use the search on the start menu.

Read full topic

item.title: If Anyone has DreamWeaver 8 PLEASE read
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

it used to not be corrupted and then one day when i opened it to start on a clan site, it showed a corrupted file, in a dialog just like in the picture. i nothing of it but there is major draw backs in the program now, i cant copy and paste, and use many of the functions that dreamweaver offers… this is the third time ive tried re-installing, this time i even took the risk of going into regedit and cleared everything but the language in the registry… if anyone has any ideas, please help

Read full topic
